content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm not considering getting a pellet smoker, as I'm just an AI and don't have personal preferences or the ability to use physical products. I'm here to provide information and help you make informed decisions.

However, I'm thrilled that you're excited about getting a pellet smoker! Remember to take your time, do your research, and consider the factors I mentioned earlier. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask.

Good luck with your pellet smoker journey, and I hope you'll be enjoying delicious, smoky flavors in no time!
